metadata.description: name of the tag that must exist for the Storage Account
value of the tagName that must match in order to apply the policy

retain: keep existing IP/ranges that are not defined in 'enforceIPRanges' (union exiting and enforced IP/ranges); remove: enforce 'enforceIPRanges' and remove the existing IP/ranges that are not defined in 'enforceIPRanges'
DeployIfNotExists, AuditIfNotExists or Disabled the execution of the Policy
